poem:
The Odyssey Reimagined

Through time's curved lens,  
Nolan bends Homer's threads—  
the wine-dark seas  
unfurled in Imax.  
  
Sirens hum  
in digital refrain—  
epic echoes chase  
the olive-scented wraiths.  
  
Modern sails unfurled,  
a hero finds  
new form between  
the flickering sea lights.
